title: Cap Crown, 1701–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop and twist with twist return
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap crown with a design of large conventionalized leaves, flowers and floral clusters surrounding a central heart-shaped motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Crown, 1701–50.
1701–50. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop and twist with twist return. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-10.
